title: Set Effects
textBeforeTable: Note that the Sets with negative effects (such as 3 parts equipped: opposite effect, or the ones marked (Minus)) are supposed to be usage restrictions of items rather than bonuses. For example, you can only equip 2 of the 3 items of an opposite-effect set, and you can't equip all of the Minus parts, unless you really want a negative effect rather than good equipment. } document.write(' Advertisement
